text: Balzer may refer to: ==Surname== * Arthur J. Balzer (1895–1962), American merchant * Falk Balzer (b. 1973), German athlete * Félix Balzer (1849–1929), French physician * George Balzer (1915–2006), American screenwriter * Howard Balzer, American sports writer, editor and broadcaster * Johann Balzer (1738–1799), Czech engraver * Karin Balzer (1938–2019), East German athlete * Oswald Balzer (1858–1933), Polish historian * Robert Lawrence Balzer (1912–2011), American wine journalist * Stephen M. Balzer (c. 1864–1940) Hungarian-American mechanic and inventor ==Other== * Balzer Jacobsen , Prime Minister of the Faroe Islands * Balzer, original name of the town of Krasnoarmeysk, Saratov Oblast, Russia * Balzer (automobile), American automobile manufacturer ==See also== * Balzers, a village in Liechtenstein
title: Balzer
